alert.note: Alert for Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pike County through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corinth, or near Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Billstown... Nathan... Pisgah... Highland in Pike County... Roy... Pike City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
